Package RRPSS

Class TableDB

Object
TableDB
public class TableDB extends Object
Table database used to obtain, update, add, remove and print table reservation in the company. Information of the table are stored in a txt file (Table.txt) in the database folder.
Since:
2021-11-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Kua Hao Ren

    Field

    private ArrayList<Table>
    tableList
    List of tables in the company.

  • Field Details

    • tableList

      private ArrayList<Table> tableList
      List of tables in the company.

  • Constructor Details

    • TableDB

      public TableDB()
      Creates a new Table database and TableDB.txt file in the database folder. To store the information of table in the company. To update the Table list with the information in the txt file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs.

  • Method Details

    • getFromTableFile

      public void getFromTableFile()
      Reads the TableDB.txt file and updates this database with the information in the txt file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • updateToTableFile

      public void updateToTableFile()
      Writes the list of Table in this database into the TableDB.txt file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • setToOccupied

      public void setToOccupied​(int tablenum)
      Searches this database and sets the status of the corresponding table to OCCUPIED upon reservation based on the table number given.
      Parameters:
      tablenum - The table number of the corresponding table

    • addReservation

      public void addReservation​(int tablenum, LocalDateTime reservationTime)
      Searches this database and sets the status of the corresponding table to RESERVED upon reservation based on the table number given. Adds this table to the list
      Parameters:
      tablenum - The table number used for the reservation
      reservationTime - The time of reservation made

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation​(int tablenum, LocalDateTime reservationTime)
      Searches this database and sets the status of the corresponding table to AVAILABLE upon reservation based on the table number given. Removes this table from the list.
      Parameters:
      tablenum - The table number used for the reservation
      reservationTime - The time of reservation to be removed

    • searchTable

      public Table searchTable​(int tablenum)
      Searches this database for a valid table with the corresponding table number.
      Parameters:
      tablenum - The table number of the table to be searched for
      Returns:

    • findAvailableTable

      public int findAvailableTable​(int pax, LocalDateTime time)
      Searches this database for a valid available table with the corresponding pax (in terms of table size) based on the time of reservation.
      Parameters:
      pax - The number of pax required (corresponds to the table size)
      time - The time of reservation made on this table
      Returns:
      The table number of the corresponding table based on statues (AVAILABLE, RESERVED, OCCUPIED)

    • releaseTable

      public void releaseTable​(int tableNumber)
      Searches this database for a valid table with the corresponding table number. Releases the table by setting the status of this table to AVAILABLE if table has no existing reservation. Else, status of table remains RESERVED.
      Parameters:
      tableNumber - The table number to be released

    • printTableList

      public void printTableList()
      Searches and prints the list of tables with the corresponding details in this database.

    • checkExpiry

      public void checkExpiry()
      check whether the reservation expire one day or not
